sect2.title: Syntax
sect2.para: This element occurs in the element stageinfo.

sect2.title: Description
sect2.para: The element environment allows you to define one or more environment variables to be added to the system environment used when calling the commands of the stage to which it applies.

By default, the supplied value replaces any existing value for the specified variable. The attribute mode allows you to specify whether the supplied value should be prepended or appended to the existing value.

sect2.title: Examples
sect2.programlisting:
echo Stage
export GCCFLAGS=-O2 export PATH=/usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a:$PATH export LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS -s"
echo Executing configure cd /usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a ./configure
echo Executing make cd /usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a make
echo Executing make cd /usr/src/gzip.1.2.4a make install
echo Exiting stage
